properties.comment: Properties specific to "publishing" a Kuali project
properties.entry:
• Publish a snapshot of this project into the public domain:
  • Execute "deploy site-deploy" on the project using the "kuali-release" profile
    • ${jenkins.job.description.kualiRelease}
  • Deploy the build artifacts to Kuali's publicly accessible S3 repository
  • Publish the Maven web site
